alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 3:21PM EST until January 31 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport. Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. .Brief flooding is expected along the White River at Edwardsport and Mississinea River near Ridgeville with more widespread flooding expected elsewhere across central Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Edwardsport. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flooding of low agricultural fields begin. Daviess CR 375 WN and North River Rd in Knox County located inside the levees are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Sunday /12:00 PM CST Sunday/ the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 15.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning to 14.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will rise to flood stage Tuesday evening. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 500 AM EST /400 AM CST/.
